column1:
The Republican nominee for President has no government experience and has done nothing in his career to demonstrate that he is competent to be President, 0, 25
He has made repeated misstatements and inaccurate statements, 25, 33
He has insulted minorities women a war hero and Gold Star parents, 33, 45
He is unqualified and unfit to be President, 45, 53
I have never voted for a Democrat but I will vote for Secretary Clinton."
